## Source: ossf-package-analysis (820657ccb39c885de6a5d6006ee75064ffa46699e8af105375b12a67436649fc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@dle-multiform-angular-component/core' @ 13.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
